home: A dedicated software engineer with a specialization in frontend development, utilizing modern technologies like React and Next.js to create seamless and dynamic user interfaces. My expertise lies in translating design concepts into functional and engaging web applications that provide users with an excellent experience.
about: I am a Software Engineer based in Egypt, who's experienced in Nextjs developement and building application from scratch to production. My love for problem solving drives me to create innovative solutions for complex problems.
